${modID}:CardMods.NAME: CardMods
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL When ${modID}:Devoured: Shuffle a random power into your draw pile.
NL When ${modID}:Devoured: Shuffle a random power into your draw pile with this effect.

${modID}:Rations.NAME: Ration
${modID}:Rations.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Tasteless, but nutritious and filling; These are perfect emergency rations.

${modID}:Gore.NAME: Gore
${modID}:Gore.DESCRIPTION: When this card is Exhausted, lose !M! Strength. NL When ${modID}:Devoured: Gain !M! Strength.
${modID}:Gore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sweet, sweet flesh! You were going mad surviving off crackers and cheese.

${modID}:MissingPerson.NAME: Missing Person
${modID}:MissingPerson.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card.
${modID}:MissingPerson.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card.

${modID}:Casanova.NAME: Casanova
${modID}:Casanova.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL When ${modID}:Devoured: Apply !${modID}:M2! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Casanova.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL When ${modID}:Devoured: Apply !${modID}:M2! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Cleave.NAME: Cleave
${modID}:Cleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Fatal: Gain [E] .
${modID}:Cleave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Fatal: Gain [E] .

${modID}:FleshyWine.NAME: Fleshy Wine
${modID}:FleshyWine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're ${modID}:Ravenous, do it again.
${modID}:FleshyWine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're ${modID}:Ravenous, do it again.

${modID}:Cravings.NAME: Cravings
${modID}:Cravings.DESCRIPTION: Increase the cap of *X-Cost cards by !M!.
${modID}:Cravings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase the cap of *X-Cost cards by !M!.

${modID}:ProudVintner.NAME: Proud Vintner
${modID}:ProudVintner.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add !M! *Pride{!M!|>1,<1=s} to your hand. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1,<1=s}.
${modID}:ProudVintner.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add !M! *Pride{!M!|>1,<1=s} to your hand. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1,<1=s}.

${modID}:ComplexFlavor.NAME: Complex Flavor
${modID}:ComplexFlavor.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Randomly discard a card. NL Randomly Exhaust a card.
${modID}:ComplexFlavor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Randomly discard a card. NL Randomly Exhaust a card.

${modID}:Impatience.NAME: Impatience
${modID}:Impatience.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X damage. NL Exhaust the top X cards of your draw pile.
${modID}:Impatience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X damage. NL Exhaust the top X cards of the draw pile.

${modID}:FastingStrike.NAME: Fasting Strike
${modID}:FastingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Dazed into the draw pile.
${modID}:FastingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Dazed into the draw pile.

${modID}:WineTasting.NAME: Wine Tasting
${modID}:WineTasting.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Exhaust cards instead of discarding them.
${modID}:WineTasting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Exhaust cards instead of discarding them.

${modID}:ServingTray.NAME: Serving Tray
${modID}:ServingTray.DESCRIPTION: {@@} Gain !B! Block. NL When Exhausted: Gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]} .{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}
${modID}:ServingTray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@} Gain !B! Block. NL When Exhausted: Gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]} .{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}

${modID}:Shuck.NAME: Shuck
${modID}:Shuck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Purge.
${modID}:Shuck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Purge.

${modID}:HungerPangs.NAME: Hunger Pangs
${modID}:HungerPangs.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of the turn add !M! *Ration{!M!|>1,<1=s} to your hand.
${modID}:HungerPangs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of the turn add !M! *Ration{!M!|>1,<1=s} to your hand.

${modID}:WickedWiles.NAME: Wicked Wiles
${modID}:WickedWiles.DESCRIPTION: Apply Weak to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Purge.
${modID}:WickedWiles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply Weak to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CoverTracks.NAME: Cover Tracks
${modID}:CoverTracks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Purge.

${modID}:Bruteforce.NAME: Bruteforce
${modID}:Bruteforce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to !${modID}:M2! times your ${modID}:Ravenous.
${modID}:Bruteforce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to !${modID}:M2! times your ${modID}:Ravenous.

${modID}:Unsuspected.NAME: Unsuspected
${modID}:Unsuspected.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain more Block equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous.
${modID}:Unsuspected.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain more Block equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous.

${modID}:PickyEater.NAME: Picky Eater
${modID}:PickyEater.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Devour a card in your *Exhaust pile.
${modID}:PickyEater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Devour a card in your *Exhaust pile.

${modID}:HideTheEvidence.NAME: Hide the Evidence
${modID}:HideTheEvidence.DESCRIPTION: Lose HP equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous, then lose ALL of it. NL Purge.
${modID}:HideTheEvidence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose HP equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous, then lose ALL of it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CannedFood.NAME: Canned Food
${modID}:CannedFood.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The next time you gain ${modID}:Ravenous, immediately gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]} .
${modID}:CannedFood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}The next time you gain ${modID}:Ravenous, immediately gain {!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]} .

${modID}:Consume.NAME: Consume
${modID}:Consume.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous. NL Fatal: Heal !M! HP. NL Purge.
${modID}:Consume.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to your ${modID}:Ravenous. NL Fatal: Heal !M! HP. NL Purge.

${modID}:PalateCleanser.NAME: Palate Cleanser
${modID}:PalateCleanser.DESCRIPTION: Reset ${modID}:Risk to 0. NL You cannot reduce *Risk for !${modID}:M2! turns.
${modID}:PalateCleanser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reset ${modID}:Risk to 0. NL Increase maximum *Risk by !M!. NL You cannot reduce *Risk for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
${modID}:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL You can Exhaust{!M!|>1,<1= up to} !M! card{!M!|>1,<1=s} to gain Block equal to the unblocked damage dealt{!M!|>1,<1= for each}.
${modID}:Ambush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL You can Exhaust{!M!|>1,<1= up to} !M! card{!M!|>1,<1=s} to gain Block equal to the unblocked damage dealt{!M!|>1,<1= for each}.

${modID}:RiskTaker.NAME: Risk Taker
${modID}:RiskTaker.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Increase maximum ${modID}:Risk by !M! this turn.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=} NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RiskTaker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Increase maximum ${modID}:Risk by !M! this turn.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=} NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Feast.NAME: Feast
${modID}:Feast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1,<1=s}. NL Draw !${modID}:M2! more card for each enemy in combat.
${modID}:Feast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1,<1=s}. NL Draw !${modID}:M2! more card for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:Savagery.NAME: Savagery
${modID}:Savagery.DESCRIPTION: Gain ${modID}:Risk up to your maximum. NL Deal X (!D!) damage for each *Risk gained.
${modID}:Savagery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain ${modID}:Risk up to your maximum. NL Deal X (!D!) damage for each *Risk gained.

${modID}:GnashingFangs.NAME: Gnashing Fangs
${modID}:GnashingFangs.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! *Temp. *HP and half as much ${modID}:Ravenous.
${modID}:GnashingFangs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! *Temp. *HP and half as much ${modID}:Ravenous.

${modID}:SetTheTable.NAME: Set the Table
${modID}:SetTheTable.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Craven *Skill and *Attack to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SetTheTable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Upgraded *Craven *Skill and *Attack to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Appetizer.NAME: Appetizer
${modID}:Appetizer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Devour a card. NL Next time you play this, play a copy of that card.
${modID}:Appetizer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Devour a card. NL Next time you play this, play a copy of that card.

${modID}:Charity.NAME: Charity
${modID}:Charity.DESCRIPTION: Gain up to !M! ${modID}:Risk. NL For each *Risk gained, gain !B! Block.
${modID}:Charity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain up to !M! ${modID}:Risk. NL For each *Risk gained, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:MealPrep.NAME: Meal Prep
${modID}:MealPrep.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you max out your ${modID}:Risk, Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.
${modID}:MealPrep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you max out your ${modID}:Risk, Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Planning.NAME: Planning
${modID}:Planning.DESCRIPTION: Gain up to !M! ${modID}:Risk this turn, and gain that much *Risk cap during the next turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Planning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain up to !M! ${modID}:Risk this turn, and gain that much *Risk cap during the next turn.

${modID}:LieInWait.NAME: Lie in Wait
${modID}:LieInWait.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Risk cap next turn.
${modID}:LieInWait.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Risk cap next turn.

${modID}:Unsolved.NAME: Unsolved
${modID}:Unsolved.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Risk. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Unsolved.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Risk. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SavorIt.NAME: Savor It
${modID}:SavorIt.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !${modID}:M2! card{!${modID}:M2!|>1,<1=s}. NL ${modID}:Food.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}
${modID}:SavorIt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !${modID}:M2! card{!${modID}:M2!|>1,<1=s}. NL ${modID}:Food.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}

${modID}:Presentation.NAME: Presentation
${modID}:Presentation.DESCRIPTION: Convert up to !M! ${modID}:Risk into Strength until the end of this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Presentation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Convert up to !M! ${modID}:Risk into Strength until the end of this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ForcedSedation.NAME: Forced Sedation
${modID}:ForcedSedation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Brazen.NAME: Brazen
${modID}:Brazen.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!${modID}:HasBrazen!|1=Trigger your ${modID}:Ravenous without taking damage.|@=Your ${modID}:Ravenous damage is also dealt to a random enemy.}
${modID}:Brazen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL {!${modID}:HasBrazen!|1=Trigger your ${modID}:Ravenous without taking damage.|@=Your ${modID}:Ravenous damage is also dealt to a random enemy.}

${modID}:Snack.NAME: Snack
${modID}:Snack.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !${modID}:SV! card{!${modID}:SV!|>1,<1=s}. NL When ${modID}:Devoured: Draw increases by 1.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}
${modID}:Snack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !${modID}:SV! card{!${modID}:SV!|>1,<1=s}. NL When ${modID}:Devoured: Draw increases by 1.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}

${modID}:SingleOut.NAME: Single Out
${modID}:SingleOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M! and add one of those cards to your hand.
${modID}:SingleOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M! and add one of those cards to your hand.

${modID}:ImportedGoods.NAME: Imported Goods
${modID}:ImportedGoods.DESCRIPTION: Add a random *X-Cost card to your hand. Its maximum X is increased by !M!. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ImportedGoods.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random *X-Cost card to your hand. Its maximum X is increased by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Starter.NAME: Starter
${modID}:Starter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL If your ${modID}:Risk is at 0, draw X cards.

${modID}:Dessert.NAME: Dessert
${modID}:Dessert.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL If ${modID}:Seconds is at 0, deal triple damage instead.|<1=} NL ${modID}:Food.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL *Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}
${modID}:Dessert.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL If ${modID}:Seconds is at 0, deal triple damage instead.|<1=} NL ${modID}:Food.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL *Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}

${modID}:Banquet.NAME: Banquet
${modID}:Banquet.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Devour your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card *Devoured.
${modID}:Banquet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Devour your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card *Devoured.

${modID}:Peppers.NAME: Peppers
${modID}:Peppers.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL When ${modID}:Devoured, your next attack deals !${modID}:M2! more damage. NL ${modID}:Food.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}
${modID}:Peppers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL When ${modID}:Devoured, your next attack deals !${modID}:M2! more damage. NL ${modID}:Food.{!${modID}:S!|>0= NL ${modID}:Seconds !${modID}:S!.|<1=}

${modID}:Fattening.NAME: Fattening
${modID}:Fattening.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you debuff the target, draw X cards.
${modID}:Fattening.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you debuff the target, draw X cards.

${modID}:Exploitation.NAME: Exploitation
${modID}:Exploitation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Steal !M! Strength this turn.
${modID}:Exploitation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Steal !M! Strength this turn.

${modID}:Hysteria.NAME: Hysteria
${modID}:Hysteria.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If that enemy dies this turn, deal the same damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:Hysteria.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If that enemy dies this turn, deal the same damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Restraint.NAME: Restraint
${modID}:Restraint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to the size of your *Exhaust pile.
${modID}:Restraint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to the size of your *Exhaust pile.

${modID}:Hearty.NAME: Hearty
${modID}:Hearty.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When Devoured: Gain !B! *Temp. *HP, scaling with Dexterity.
${modID}:Hearty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When Devoured: Gain !B! *Temp. *HP, scaling with Dexterity.

${modID}:Craven.NAME: Craven
${modID}:Craven.DESCRIPTION: Add X *Shame to your hand. NL Gain !${modID}:M2!X [E] .
${modID}:Craven.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle X *Shame into your draw pile. NL Gain !${modID}:M2!X [E] .

${modID}:PreciousTreasure.NAME: Precious Treasure
${modID}:PreciousTreasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: She's one thing I ever did right. I'm beyond saving, but I owe it to her to see it through.
